title: Store won't open just blank.
body: Hi good evening I have been trying to open the store for the past 30 minutes now and I have been even re-logging and still won't open. Can you please help me with this or is it a bug that everyone is having at the moment. Thank you in advance.

replies.body: Good evening to you as well, though I'm sorry about this black page coming up!  No worries, though, this can be resolved by going over the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Your network seems to be struggling to download assets to services in the client, like the store, so that should help!

Hi I just went to the link you provided and got this message. 

"Sorry!
We currently do not have results for this location. Please check out supported locations and feel free to explore other locations below.

Hastings, Christ Church, Barbados"
Hey, on the very top right of the page, are you able to change the language to English?
Yes I am but that doesn't do anything I still get the same message

Hey no worries!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can work with you directly through there.  If you have any issues using the ticketing center, you can also email us at support@riotgames.com.

I get that black screen every time my client is open over night without fail. restarting client usually (but not always) fixes it but its still aggravating none the less.

I've been through the  connections issues guide, and nothing there seems to make a difference.

I got this issue a lot.
For me it get fixed if i just swap between one of the other options and back for example collection or profile and than back to store.
Not sure if it is the same issue but might help as well for you :)

Update: left it for a while and got this when trying to use the purchase world ticket missions link

" Failed to load URL "https://store.na2.lol.riotgames.com/storefront/ui/v2/featured.html?accountid=230094283&language=en_US&port=53742&clientRegion=na&selectedItems=&auth_token=d9fb08b7-5af4-4324-be63-4332717b0c04" with error "ERR_SPDY_PROTOCOL_ERROR" (-337). "

Same issue. I've done everything the support pages have told me to. It worked just long enough for me to purchase RP, now I can't spend it. If the skins go off sale before I can get them I'm going to be super peeved.
